items.desc: WASHINGTON (AP) _ Republicans give George W. Bush credit for promoting a Russian role in smoothing the transition from despot to democrat in Yugoslavia _ an idea dismissed in debate as risky by Al Gore even as his boss was trying to get Moscow to step in .

Democrat Joseph Lieberman matches some of Cheney 0027s foreign policy experience with his Senate Armed Services Committee membership and involvement on a range of international issues during his dozen years in the Senate .
